headline: How F5’s New CASI and ARS AI Security Benchmarks At F5 (FFIV) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: In February 2026, F5, Inc. launched new AI security threat intelligence tools, CASI and ARS leaderboards, built on its CalypsoAI acquisition, giving enterprises standardized, monthly benchmarks to compare the risk profiles and resilience of widely used AI models before production deployment. This move positions F5 Labs as a reference point for AI model security evaluation, integrating real-time attack intelligence with its Application Delivery and Security Platform to help organizations...

headline: A Look At F5 (FFIV) Valuation After Strong Quarter And Expanded AI Security Offerings
summary: F5 (FFIV) is back in focus after first quarter fiscal 2026 results topped market forecasts, with systems revenue up 37% year over year and management lifting its full year revenue and non GAAP EPS guidance. See our latest analysis for F5. Despite the upbeat quarter and new AI security offerings like CASI and ARS, the 1 day share price return of 2.22% and 7 day share price return of 2.53% show some near term hesitation, while a 90 day share price return of 13.74% and 3 year total shareholder...
